name: Codename Castle II
description:
Controls:  Keyboard:  Arrow Keys, X to interact

You're behind on your milestone for project Castle, now you need to go in and exterminate the rats so we can get the renovations on time!

Winner of the Ubisoft Internal Game Jam in 2015 it was made in 48hours using Construct 3 and home-baked treats. 

Team:

  • Alicia Fortier :  Game Design, Gameplay Programming
  • Liam Wong: Environment Art
  • Melchior Corgié : Programming, tech wizardry
  • Vincenzo Spina: Character art & Animations, Intro & Outro videos
